.spacer{width:100%}.spacer .hide-on-mobile,.spacer .show-on-medium,.spacer .spacer-dummy{display:none}.spacer .only-on-mobile{display:block}.spacer-use-style-system{height:0}.spacer-xx-small{height:3px}.spacer-x-small{height:5px}.spacer-small{height:15px}.spacer-medium{height:25px}.spacer-large{height:40px}.spacer-x-large{height:50px}.spacer-xx-large{height:60px}.spacer-style-system .spacer-large,.spacer-style-system .spacer-medium,.spacer-style-system .spacer-small,.spacer-style-system .spacer-x-large,.spacer-style-system .spacer-x-small,.spacer-style-system .spacer-xx-large,.spacer-style-system                </a>

            Find Your Trade-In Value
            <svg>
             <use xlink:href="#icon-external-link" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
             </use>
            </svg>
           </a>
           <section class="modal-overlay modal-overlay__theme-dialog fullscreenEnabled no-spacing">
            <section class="dialog-modal-wrapper">
             <div aria-hidden="false" aria-label="Important information" class="dialog-modal modal--dialog modal-overlay-item" data-dialog-modal-id="find-your-trade-in-value-link" role="dialog">
              <div class="dialog-modal__bg modal-overlay-background" data-modal-overlay-close="true" role="button" tabindex="0">
              </div>
              <div class="dialog-modal__container modal-overlay-content">
               <div class="dialog-modal__content-wrapper">
                <div class="dialog-modal__content">
                 <div class="fma__dialog-modal">
                  <p class="fma__dialog-modal-text">
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   You are about to leave
                   <a href="http://bmwusa.com/" title="http://BMWUSA.com">
                    BMWUSA.com
                   </a>
                   and will be directed to the Black Book Credit Score powered by Equifax. The information you provide to Black Book, excluding your credit score, will be shared with BMW and a BMW dealership for the purpose of improving your car buying experience.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                 <div class="dialog-modal__cta-holder">
                  <a class="button transparent-button dialog-modal__close" href="">
                   Cancel
                  </a>
                  <a analytics-event="footer-shopping-tools.find-your-trade-in-value.find-your-trade-in-value.link" class="button blue-button dialog-modal__accept" href="https://www.intelliprice.com/intellipricedealer/start.htm?dealerid=952001" target="_blank">
                   Ok
                  </a>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </section>
           </section>
          </div>
